p: Digital ulcers are a serious problem in SSc, occurring in 30% to 50% of patients with SSc. 3 4 These ulcers are very painful and heal slowly with scarring and digital resorption, which causes substantial functional disability. 5 6 Infections in ulcers may also occur and can lead to gangrene and amputation of the extremities. 7 Unfortunately, the available treatment options do not increase ulcer healing or are not effective in a significant proportion of patients.
